name: HO10
description:
HOLO

Game developed in a few hours for the Stop Waiting for Godot jam. First time testing the Godot Engine. The experience couldn't have been better.

Puzzle platformer. Use your holographic copies to advance through the levels.

How to play:

MOVE -> arrows / SHOOT -> Space

-----

Game art: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack
